comment: * Thrown when an error occurs in any method that has a session context.

variables.name: ERROR_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: * The SessionException has an unknown error code.

variables.name: ERROR_RESOURCE_CONTENTION
variables.comment:
* This indicates that apps using MediaDrm sessions are
         * temporarily exceeding the capacity of available crypto
         * resources. The app should retry the operation later.

methods.name: public int getErrorCode()
methods.comment: * Retrieve the error code associated with the SessionException
